name: Idea Bubble Ltd
tagline: You Dream it, We Build it.
description:
What we do:
We are a software development company located in Ireland with a very powerful asset, our PLATFORM. We create, integrate, and develop web applications so that our customers have flexible, affordable and scalable solutions to drive their businesses and succeed. 
Who we are: 
Our team is creative, innovative and skilled. We are determined to transform inefficiencies in companies using the latest technologies. 
When we started:
Founded in 2008, we have grafted our way in the technology space both nationally and internationally, investing in our PLATFORM, we have expanded our team and grown into markets such as Retail, Insurance, Education, Entertainment. We have reached far beyond our wildest dreams! 
READ MORE...
